org.lindbergframework.persistence
Class TemplateBase

java.lang.Object
  org.lindbergframework.persistence.TemplateBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistenceTemplate
Direct Known Subclasses:
LinpTemplate
public abstract class TemplateBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements PersistenceTemplate

abstract template base with main resources for all persistence template implementations.

Author:
Victor Lindberg

populateBeans

public <E> java.util.List<E> populateBeans(java.lang.Class<E> clazz,
                                           DataSet ds)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                       BeanPopulateException
Populates the DataSet result as a list of beans using the configured bean populator implementation in this template.

Type Parameters:
E - expected bean type.
Parameters:
clazz - bean class for population.
ds - DataSet implementation to populate.
Returns:
populated beans list.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - error access DataSet.
BeanPopulateException - population failed.

populateBean

public <E> E populateBean(java.lang.Class<E> clazz,
                          DataSet ds)
               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                      BeanPopulateException
Populates a bean for unique result. Only first record from DataSet will be populated.

Type Parameters:
E - expected bean type.
Parameters:
clazz - bean class for population.
ds - DataSet implementation to populate.
Returns:
populated bean.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - error access DataSet.
BeanPopulateException - population failed.
